13221.content:
With a sigh you got ready for school , reliving the kiss in your mind. Arriving at school you walk down the hall unaware of your surroundings, as you bump into one of the jocks . Soon a wave of fear knock you out of your fantasy afraid to look up at the enraged jock.

"Oh there you are cutie" the jock said warping his massive arms around you lifting you off the ground.

Soon your eye meet and you were shocked to realized it was actually Walt, but he looked somewhat different. He had a strong square jaw , all the pimples on his face were gone ,his hair no longer covered most of his face and obviously his new physique.

"Sorry I have to cancel our date tonight, I got football practice " Walt said disappointed

" Dont worry this well make it up to you" Walt said with a grin, as his soft lips pressed against yours.

Soon you felt your feet touch the floor again ,as the blush on your face retuned . Looking slowly looking up at Walt admiring his 8-pack push though his button-up shirt, as his pecs and shoulders stained the tight the shirt. Looking up into Walt big, sweet eyes looking directly at yours still somewhat shocked.

"See you later cutie" Walt said before walking down the hall, watching everyone stepped aside, as his passed.

For a moment, you stood there in a daze, before you realized that dozens of eyes were staring at you with shock. Overwhelmed with all of the attention you quick make way to your classroom.

The rest of the day you overheard rumors of the scene this morning and everytime you passed Walt in the hall he give you wink and a smile enough to make you blush.

After school you.....
13221.title: Was your muscular boyfriend

132211.content:
After school you head towards the football field to meet Walt after practice. Walking up to the stands you were surprised to find a group of girls crowed together near at the center asof the stands. Quickly hiding near crowd ,as the team ran on to the field.

Some of the girls started to squeal, as the guys started to take off their shirts tossing them on the nearby benchs. Slowly a blush appeared across your face when you spot Walt noticing he was slightly larger then most of the guys ,as he stood in front preforming a few stretches and basic exercises,while the other guys followed his lead.

Sitting there mesmerised by Walt admiring his muscular back , as your eyes trailed down to his tight meaty-ass watching it strain the thin fabric of his shorts pushing-out with each squat.Soon switching into a leg stretch admiring his massive thighs leading down to his ball of muscle calves.

(Now switching to Walts point of view)

"Ok guys ready to run some laps" Walt yelled as he lead the team to the track.

Looking over at the stands when he saw Max in the crowd of squealing girls, as the blush grow across his face. Slowly running ahead soon separating from the team leaving them behind looking back to watch them struggle to keep up.

" Just a few more laps" Walt yelled at the team

"Ok Captain " the team yelled back.

Turning back at to look at Max in the stands giving him a small wave ,as he passed the stands. Watching Max cover his face to hide the blush, nearly tripping over. Quickly looking away to hide his our blush and embarrassment.

"Ok team small break" Walt yelled watching the guys near collapse of exhaustion

"Oh sorry guys guess I pushed you guys a little to far today,so hit the showers we'll continue this tomorrow " Walt yelled pointing them towards the showers.

(Switching back to Max's point of view)

You watch as some of the girls went down to meet the football players. Following a few feet behind , watching the them let the girl squeeze there biceps or preform a few poses. Looking around your eyes meet with Walt, as the blush appeared on both your faces.Watching him enter the locker room.After a few minutes you watchedthe crowd of girl disbanded, untilmit was just you and at least 4 other girls.

Looking up to see Walt walking towards you in cotton blue short-sleeved and a pair of khakis shorts. Soon the 4 girls surrounded him grabbing his arms.Walt mesmerised both you and the girls with a simple flex, watching his biceps rise,until one of the girls run her hand over his massive bugle.

"Hey hands off I'm ready taken"Walt said pushing the girl away and walking towards you

" Heya cutie guesses we can go on that date after all" Walt said before warping his arms around you giving you a small squeeze and a prick on the cheek.

"Like he said his taken" You said watching the girls stare at you with a mixture of shock and jealousy.

"So Walt were should we go ?" You said looking up at him

Thinking for a minute he decided to go......

1322111.content:
"Why don't we go to your place and have some fun there," Walt said with a smirk

"Umm ya my place," you said somewhat nervously

Nearing one of the exits when you heard a deep startling voice from behind

"Yo Cap" you heard turning around to see a huge muscle gut just inches away from your face.

"Hey Big Ben saw you felling behind during the lap," Walt said

"Sorry Cap guesses it was this gut of mine," Ben said jokingly while giving his gut a scratch.

You just stood there speechless at the towering giant. In the back of your head, you know he deserved the title Big Ben. Barely able to see the guys face passed his hairy pecs having to crane your head back just to see his face as he towered over you at 6'10 at your 5'3 stature, while Walt stood at 6 foot. Looking over the hulking linebacker thick and heavy arms and legs packed with hidden muscle covered with a layer of fat, while you struggled not to look down at the massive endowment below the belt. Awing over the guys' hulking frame you started listening to the conversation again.

"I'm going to pack on so much muscle I'm going to be calling you tiny Ben petty soon," Walt said confidently

" Ya you just need to grow an entire foot and gain over 300 pounds of muscle " Ben laughed

" Besides is this little fella your new boyfriend everyone been talking about," Ben said intrigued

" Ya this is Max was about to go on our date," Walt said looking down at with a wide grin

"Well I'll leave you love birds alone now cya cap," Ben said as he walked away, while you watched his bubble-butt bounce with each step.

Walking down the sidewalk you held Walts' hand. Eventually making it to your house. Soon finding yourself watching a horror movie sitting between Walts's legs, as his arms warped around you, while he trembled with fear.

"Hey it's getting late would you mind me staying over," Walt said

"Umm of course not," you said blushing

Making your way to the bedroom, as Walt followed behind.

"I think my bed large enou.." cutting off your sentence when you turn to see Walt shirtless with his shorts halfway down his things, as he stood there now wearing nothing, but a pair of black boxers. Climbing into your bed taking up most of the room. Just like Walt to slip off into nothing but your boxers and slowly crawling into the little space left with a little room left between you two. Soon Walt pulled you closer feeling his abs grind into your backs and pecs pushed your head forward.

Soon drifting off to sleep you dreamt about.....
1322111.title: Go over to your place

info.brief_description: You start having strange dreams that change reality around you
info.description:
Your name is Max, you're 17, good looking, and used to getting your way. One day, you wake up after a strange dream to discover that your dream is real now! Now, every dream and nightmare you have comes true, and you aren't sure how. What happens? Thats up to you to decide!

Some rules to get you started:

1.No vore
2.No beastiality
3.No pedophilia
4.I will allow some leeway here and allow minor sex, just keep it to the content rating and please no toilet stuff.
5.Cursing is allowed
6.No killing

If its not mentioned above, then you may go ahead and add it. Please note that I reserve the right to delete chapters as I like.

75 gift points will be given for long chapters containing good grammer and at least two paragraphs.

Please include lots of different options and have fun!
